In the first game we already learned that Ellie is a strong independent girl\, now she is a strong young women and so is most of the women you will meet on your journey. They grew up in this harsh and unforgiving world and killing is part of survival.Playing different characters was an eye opener to me as it forced me to look at things from a different perspective.
